decision_conditions: +1 Design ext appearance OK in CA
+1 Design ext appearance OK in CA
+1 Design ext appearance OK in CA
Hrs bldg wks resi amenity adj occ
Dvpmt in accordance with approvd plans
DES External works to match existing
+2 Ensure time limit is same as original
description: Variation of Condition 1 of planning permission dated 28th December 2023 (RN: 23/07346/FULL) for, 'Demolition of existing roof and erection of a mansard roof extension at first floor level and alterations to the front and rear of the portion of the building fronting onto Bryanston Mews East. Subdivision and reconfiguration of existing ground and lower ground floor levels of the building and together with the new first floor extension to the mews portion of the building, create two self-contained residential units (Class C3) and associated external alterations. Lowering of front pavement vault' [Site includes 22 Bryanston Mews East]; Namely, to alter the proposed garage door and windows to mews). (Application under Section 73 of the Act).
